name: zwoosh
description: Dragscroll, Wheelzoom and Infinityscroll Javascript and Typescript library

scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run styles
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment && npm run sync
scripts.deployment: npm run git && npm run publish && bower register zwoosh https://github.com/chaoos/zwoosh.git
scripts.styles: stylus zwoosh.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist && cleancss dist/zwoosh.css -o dist/zwoosh.min.css
scripts.start: tsc && cd example && tsc && cd .. && concurrently "watchify -dvs zwoosh -o dist/zwoosh.js zwoosh.js" "stylus -w example/example.styl --import node_modules/nib -o example" "stylus -w zwoosh.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist" "npm run lite" "npm run tsc-w" "npm run tsc-w-example" "globify -w "test/*.js" -o test_bundle.js"
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages; git merge master; git push; git checkout master
scripts.git: git commit -a && git push origin master

author: Roman Gruber <p1020389@yahoo.com>
